text: satyavannu nambi satkarmagalannu maduttiruvavaru (gatakaladalli) enannu tindiddaru, avaru dharmanistharu, visvasigalu agiddu satkarmagalannu maduttiruvavaragiddare mattu sada dharmanistharu, satyadalli nambike ullavaru, kedukugalinda dura uliyuvavaru, saujan'ya toruvavaru agiddare, avara mele papavenilla. Allahanu satkarmigalannu pritisuttane
